title: Tadej Poga훾ar Swats Away Rivals, Sets Tone for the Classics at UAE Tour
content:
Was it ever in doubt? Poga훾ar caps inch-perfect week with 8km solo victory on final stage of UAE Tour. Next? Strade, San Remo, Flanders.
